name: Graywater Laundry-to-Landscape Rebate
description: Up to $400 for installing graywater laundry-to-landscape system to direct washer rinse water to landscape
fullDescription: City of Palo Alto offers rebates for installing graywater systems that reuse washing machine water for landscape irrigation, reducing water consumption.
whatTheyOffer:
- Up to $400 rebate
- For laundry-to-landscape graywater systems
- Reuses washer rinse water
- Irrigates landscape with recycled water
- Reduces potable water use
- Sustainable water management
howToGetIt:
1. Must be a City of Palo Alto water customer
2. Apply through Valley Water before starting
3. Get project pre-approved
4. Install graywater laundry-to-landscape system
5. Ensure proper installation and connections
6. Submit final documentation for rebate
